media:group.media:title: Introduction to Classical Mechanics
media:group.media:description:
Hello and welcome to this video course on classical mechanics! Before you get started with this course, you should have a basic understanding of calculus and linear algebra. If you haven't, don't be lazy and open some books. Or watch the great video series by 3blue1brown, that should be enough for the start:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fNk_zzaMoSs&list=PLZHQObOWTQDPD3MizzM2xVFitgF8hE_ab
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WUvTyaaNkzM&list=PLZHQObOWTQDMsr9K-rj53DwVRMYO3t5Yr

Lecture notes:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1b4xTma7ordAiXZL8aAfr1PF6BRV7puU_/view?usp=sharing
